title: LF SUpport MAin Duo Gold ++
body: Hey Looking for a Support Main to Duo With me at night and weekends fairly active pretty much on everynight and mostly weekends to climb the ranks. was plat adc till account got hacked and banned ;/. if interested add me in game or leave a post and ill get back  to ya must wanna use skype curse or teamspeak. i also stream and wanna build that up also with plays and teamwork. http://www.twitch.tv/boombeaches

replies.body:
Hello there. I am a support main who mains Sona, Nautilus and I am on my way to mastering Lu Lu.
I also Mid with Karma and can support with her well, though I've found she drops off in support position.
Would be pretty keen to practice with you to see if you'd enjoy teaming with me.
I walk dogs most days these days but I am free every night and weekends. Though Friday night and Saturday night are the sabath so am unable to play from sunset Friday night to sunset Saturday.
I also have curse. and prefer using that over skype as skype lags out my computer.

Hey, I'd be willing to support Morgana, but if shes banned you're out of luck :p. It's up 2 you.
 IGN: SomeoneNerfMe
Gold 1
